meanings.definition: A staining technique using three different dyes to differentiate between different structures in a sample.
meanings.sent1: The scientist used a trichrome stain to highlight the various cell types in the tissue sample.
meanings.sent2: The trichrome method helped distinguish between the different components of the microscopic image.
meanings.sent3: During the experiment, the trichrome stain decided to mix things up and create a rainbow effect on the slide.
meanings.sent4: The trichrome technique painted a vivid picture of the intricate details within the biological specimen.
meanings.sent5: With the trichrome staining, the tissue sections became a colorful masterpiece of scientific art.
